product_name: adidas Hiking Flex Capri Pants - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Stretchy, quick-drying and water-resistant, the women's adidas Hiking Flex Capri Pants are great for outdoor activities on mild days spring through fall. Nylon/spandex fabric stretches and dries fast. Durable water repellent finish causes light rain to bead up and roll off. Drawcord leg hems let you adjust the fit. Hand pockets; zip security pocket on thigh; belt loops. The adidas Hiking Flex Capri Pants for women have an 18 in. inseam length that covers the knees. Overstock.
short_description: Stretchy, quick-drying and water-resistant, the women's adidas Hiking Flex Capri Pants are great for outdoor activities on mild days spring through fall.
